rules.name: WONDROUS POWER
rules.text: While within 4˝ of this model, friendly models gain Empowered. (Once per turn when a model with Empowered casts an upkeep spell, reduce the COST of the spell by 1.)

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: PLASMA NIMBUS
rules.text: If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

rules.name: ASSET PROTECTION
rules.text: If this model is disabled, you can choose a non-disabled friendly model that you own within 4˝ to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Asset Protection, remove 1 damage point from this model.

rules.name: FIREPOWER
rules.text: While within 4˝ of this model, friendly models with light artillery gain boosted ranged attack damage rolls.

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: GIRDED
rules.text: This model does not suffer blast damage. Friendly models B2B with it do not suffer blast damage.

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: IMPERVIOUS FLESH
rules.text: When this model is hit by a ranged attack, the attacker rolls one less damage die.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: OBSTRUCT
rules.text: This model provides cover as if it were an obstruction.

rules.name: VALOR
rules.text: Friendly models/units within 4˝ of this model cannot flee and immediately rally. Additionally, friendly models/units that begin their activation within 4˝ of this model gain Fearless for one round.

rules.name: FUEL
rules.text: Friendly models beginning their activation within 4˝ of this model can run or charge without spending focus or being forced.

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: IT BURNS!
rules.text: If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers the Fire continuous effect unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: INMOBILE
rules.text: This model has no movement or action and cannot be knocked down or moved. Its front arc extends to 360˚. It has no melee range, cannot engage, and is automatically hit by melee attacks.

rules.name: LASH
rules.text: This model and friendly warrior models B2B with it cannot be knocked down.

rules.name: OBJECTIVE
rules.text: This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. An objective cannot be engaged.

rules.name: UP AND AT ’EM
rules.text: After resolving continuous effects during your Maintenance Phase, friendly knocked down models within 4˝ of this model stand up.
